title: How to Decrypt Messages with a Numeric One Time Pad

steps.headline: Obtain the encrypted message.
steps.description: Assume that the message is the following: 79639 36901 36540 18290 94085 0

steps.headline: Verify that the same key was used by comparing the first set of letters with your one-time pad.
steps.description: Assume that your key is the following: 79639 69354 99819 87002 57775 66097

steps.headline: Use modular addition to decrypt the cipher key.

text: Obtain the encrypted message. Assume that the message is the following: 79639 36901 36540 18290 94085 0 Verify that the same key was used by comparing the first set of letters with your one-time pad. Assume that your key is the following: 79639 69354 99819 87002 57775 66097 Use modular addition to decrypt the cipher key.
